$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/mark-dropdown.title: $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/mark-dropdown
$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/mark-dropdown.text:
<$tiddler tiddler="$:/xp/mark-button/mark-dropdown/text">
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/mark-button/mark-dropdown/color}}"""> Color </$radio> 
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/mark-button/mark-dropdown/highlight}}"""> Highlight </$radio> 
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/mark-button/mark-dropdown/css}}"""> CSS </$radio>
</$tiddler>

{{$:/xp/mark-button/mark-dropdown/text}}

$:/xp/mark-button/color.css/Examples.title: $:/xp/mark-button/color.css/Examples
$:/xp/mark-button/color.css/Examples.text:
<$macrocall $name='wikitext-example-without-html'
src='!!.r Heading level 2

*.red First item
*.green Second item
*.blue Third item
** Indented item
** Indented item
** Indented item
*.o Fourth item
'/>

$:/xp/mark-button/color.css.title: $:/xp/mark-button/color.css

$:/xp/mark-button/macros/cssmark-colour-.title: $:/xp/mark-button/macros/cssmark-colour-picker
$:/xp/mark-button/macros/cssmark-colour-.text:
\define cssmark-colour-picker-inner(actions) <$button tag="a" tooltip="""$(colour-picker-value)$"""> $actions$ \end \define cssmark-colour-picker(actions)
--- <$list filter="Red Green Blue Brown Gray Orange Pink Purple Turquoise Violet Yellow" variable="colour-picker-value"> <$macrocall $name="cssmark-colour-picker-inner" actions="""$actions$"""/>
\end

$:/xp/mark-button/macros/mark-colour-pic.title: $:/xp/mark-button/macros/mark-colour-picker
$:/xp/mark-button/macros/mark-colour-pic.text:
\define mark-colour-picker-inner(actions) <$button tag="a" tooltip="""$(colour-picker-value)$"""> $actions$ \end \define mark-colour-picker(actions)
--- <$list filter="Red Orange Yellow GreenYellow SpringGreen Blue Purple Black" variable="colour-picker-value"> <$macrocall $name="mark-colour-picker-inner" actions="""$actions$"""/>
\end

$:/xp/mark-button/readme.title: $:/xp/mark-button/readme

$:/xp/mark-button/styles.title: $:/xp/mark-button/styles
